name: Out of Home
description:
This is a small game I made for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

In this game you shoot bullets in order to move the ship. You must reach the portals to pass the levels. There are 6 levels.

You are the only survivor from the expedition team. The navigation control of the ship is broken. The ship moves in a random direction due to the navigation unit malfunction. Only way to balance and move your ship is to shoot bullets.
